name: Visual Novel Maker - little murder case
detailed_description:
New from AyatoSoundCreate, this pack is a great soundtrack for any game that has scenes for detectives, investigations, police, spies, heists, get aways, and more!

Featuring songs with modern synth production and also vintage guitar-driven funk, energetic rock songs for escapes, chill synth vibes for dramatic resolves and reveals, this pack is a great fit for any detective style games!

23 BGM in .ogg, .mp3, .m4a and looping .ogg formats

Tracklist:

01_tomorrow land(明日の世界)
02_Detective in the bar（探偵はバーに)
03_black coffee(コーヒー）
04_quiet murder(静かなる殺人）
05_Investigation started(捜査開始)
06_Listening investigation（聞き込み）
07_catch me if you can(追いかけっこ)
08_chase(追跡)
09_Anthem(アンセム）
10_battle(闘い）
11_ciber world(電脳世界）
12_clairvoyance(千里眼）
13_Downtown area(繁華街）
14_metropolis(メトロポリス）
15_Veteran(ベテラン刑事）
16_nightshade(夜遊び）
17_crossroad（十字路）
18_fire soul（燃える魂）
19_confession(懺悔)
20Last moment(最期の瞬間）
21_old soldier（老兵の挽歌）
22_Summer beach(夏の砂浜）
23_finale(フィナーレ)

short_description: New from AyatoSoundCreate, this pack is a great soundtrack for any game that has scenes for detectives, investigations, police, spies, heists, get aways, and more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

package_groups.name: default
